mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_reward_info(reward_id, name, acquired_date, host, content) VALUES(user_reward_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{acquiredDate}, #{host}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_reward_info SET name = #{name}, acquired_date = #{acquiredDate}, host = #{host}, content = #{content}
mapper.select: SELECT name, acquired_date, host, content FROM user_reward_info WHERE reward_id=#{VALUE}
